words.meaning: /ə'sembl/ v. to bring people or things together as a group
words.vietnamese: thu thập, lắp ráp, tập hợp

words.meaning: /bi'fɔ:hænd/ adv. earlier; before something else happens
/ˌkɑːmplɪˈkeɪʃn/ n. a complex combination of elements or things.
words.vietnamese: sự phức tạp, sự rắc rối

words.meaning: /kuriə/ n. a person or company whose job is to take packages or papers somewhere
words.vietnamese: người đưa tin, người đưa thư, người chuyển phát

words.meaning: /fould/ v. to bend something, especially paper or cloth
/ˈleɪaʊt/ n. the way in which the parts of something such as the page of a book, a garden or a building are arranged
/menʃn/ n. an act of refering to somebody / something in speech or writing
words.vietnamese: sự đề cập ,v. đề cập đếm

words.meaning: /pi'tiʃn/ n. a written document signed by a large people that asks somebody to change something
words.vietnamese: đơn kiến nghị, đơn thỉnh cầu ,v. cầu xin, kiến nghị

words.meaning: /pru:f/ n. information, documents, etc. that show something is true
/redʤistə/ adj. recorded and tracked somebody / something name on a list
words.vietnamese: đã vào sổ, đã đăng ký

words.meaning: /ri'vaiz/ v. to change something, such as a book or an estimate to correct or improve it
words.vietnamese: xem lại, duyệt lại, sửa lại
